title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.79 - Current liability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.79 - Current liability

State Regulations
A short-term debt, regardless of its source, including
any liability accrued and deferred and unearned revenue that is to be paid out
of current assets or is to be transferred to income within one year. The
currently maturing portion of long-term debt is thus classified unless it is to
be paid from a sinking fund or other noncurrent asset source. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.79

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
